1.title: Muskoka Private Lake View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Simon dreams of waking up to a peaceful view, looking out over a still lake in perfect silence. A place to escape the constant hustle and noise of life as a busy developer where he and his kids are the only ones on their very own private lake.

2.title: Georgian Bay Long Beach View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Michelle and Justin are outdoor enthusiasts and every spare moment is planned around kite surfing and paddle boarding trips. It's time for them to find their very own long beach view.

3.title: Niagara Vineyard View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Wine enthusiasts Christina and Ed are ready to make their lifelong dream of having a view of a lush green vineyard come true. Their Italian and Chilean roots have led them on a quest to re-locate to wine country.

4.title: Central Park Veiws

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Since childhood Bret and Stephen had big dreams to move to New York City and became Broadway stars. Hard work and dedication to their craft made that dream a reality. Now it's time for this couple to pursue another lifelong dream!

5.title: Brooklyn Bridge View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Newlyweds Rachel and Damian have grown exhausted by Manhattan's hectic pace. Since she was a little girl, Rachel has had love affair with the Brooklyn Bridge and it has birthed a desire in them to settle in Brooklyn under its auspices.

6.title: Big Sur California

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Couple Anna and Elliot are looking for an Ocean view in Big Sur California. They want a nice change of pace form their busy LA lifestyle.

7.title: San Francisco Bay, City View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Tech consultants Laura and Thang are searching for a "forever home" to raise their family in. Their dream is to own an iconic city view of downtown San Francisco where they can be inspired by the energizing view of their bustling city.

8.title: Carmel Canyon View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Theater owners Koly and LJ are dreaming of a ranch with stunning views of the canyons, valley's and hills of Carmel Valley. A secluded sanctuary in the hills where they can finally blend their two families into one.

9.title: Ocean & Dunes View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Self-made powerhouse Araceli and her daughter Victoria want a coveted Hamptons oceanfront view with grassy dunes, boardwalk paths, and picket fences, and they are willing to pay top dollar to get it.

10.title: Fort Meyers Canal View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Kelly and Pyro want a large home on the canal as a peaceful landing place for all of their extended family. This quiet life on the canal will allow them to raise their family on the water with fishing, water, and nature in their own backyard.

11.title: Fort Meyers Penthouse Ocean and Beach View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Go-getters Shelby and Alex are dreaming of a home with panoramic vies of "The Four S's": Sea, Sand, Sun, and Scenery. They are on the hunt for a rare ocean view penthouse where they can be one with the sky and live "on top of the world."

12.title: Sanibel Island, Palm Tree, White Sand Beach View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Brandon was successful in convincing Jana to move to the Sanibel island and marry him. But to stay on the island, this couple wants the ultimate palm tree and ocean beach view that Sanibel is famous for.

13.title: Rolling Northumberland Hills View

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Sandra is looking for a fresh start for her and her two young daughters. She wants to surround herself with comfort and space as well as unending views of rolling hills.

1.title: Beach

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Laura and her parents Beatrix and Reinhold yearn for the perfect California view of never-ending white sandy beaches and blue rolling surf. When they find that, they'll be living the American Dream.

2.title: Lighthouse - PEI

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Ever since she was a little girl, Melva's been dreaming of a home with majestic and mysterious views of a lighthouse. Will she find those iconic views on Prince Edward Island?

3.title: Vineyard (California)

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Lake View - Muskoka

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Ian and Austin are shopping for the ultimate view of crystal clear lakes, Muskoka granite rock and old growth Canadian pine trees - a view that is completely opposite to wear they live now - on a dusty, working farm.

5.title: Golf course (California)

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Jeff has always dreamed of outstanding views of a world-class high-end golf course. Now, with his wife Trish, the time has come to make his life long dream come true!

6.title: Red Cliffs - PEI

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Actor Wade's dream is to buy a property with a view of the deep red ruby cliffs that hug the craggy shores of Prince Edward Island. Out of three places, which one will he choose to fulfill those dreams?

7.title: Zion Red Mountains (Utah)

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Views of powerful red rock mountains in Zion Canyon, Utah is something that Eva and Chris know they can't live without. Finally that day has come to decide just which property and view could suit their family best.

8.title: Island Archipelago/Island Retreat (Salt Spring Island)

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Katherine and Aaron dream of an oasis with incredible views of dotted islands and serene waters. A warm and welcoming place for their family and friends on the Pacific shores of Canada.

9.title: Rolling Hills - PEI

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: For Mary, her idyllic view is the gently rolling and lush hills that define and shape Prince Edward Island. Will she find those views and the property for her expanding family?

10.title: Harbour View (Victoria)

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Ali and Mark love the view of a vibrant and active harbour. They are searching for a home with views of a busy harbour; a place where float planes buzz by and marine life frolics.

11.title: City Skyline (Vancouver)

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: For Camil, living downtown with views of an ever-changing cityscape is what jazzes him. His family is growing up so he's looking for a bigger home with killer views of an exciting skyline.

12.title: Winter Wonderland (Ont)

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Darren and Suzy love views of the crisp, clean winter wonderland. They're looking for a property where they can experience both the frozen playground and the quiet solitude that winter brings.

13.title: Horses

episode of.title: What's for Sale? With a View (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot:

imdb.plot outline: Building on the popular series What's For Sale comes the spin off What's for Sale...with a View. The new series takes viewers across North America featuring dream retreats with envious views. From mountain vistas and ocean views to serene vineyards and ultimate sunsets this series features the ultimate getaways.
imdb.title: What's for Sale? With a View
plot: Building on the popular series What's For Sale comes the spin off What's for Sale...with a View. The new series takes viewers across North America featuring dream retreats with envious views. From mountain vistas and ocean views to serene vineyards and ultimate sunsets this series features the ultimate getaways.::unknown
